forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Rain Showers then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
